title: The Complete 2000 AD D.R. and Quinch
description: Waldo 'D.R.' Dobbs and Ernest Errol Quinch are a pair of alien students with an unhealthy appetite for destruction. With a lust for wealth, power, fast cars and huge weaponry, trouble is never far away. This complete collection also includes 'D.R. and Quinch's Agony Page'.Collects:- DR & Quinch Have Fun on Earth (Prog #317)- DR & Quinch Go Straight (Prog #350-#351)- DR & Quinch Go Girl Crazy (Prog #352-#354)- DR & Quinch Get Drafted (Prog #355-#359)- DR & Quinch Go to Hollywood (Prog #363-#367)- DR & Quinch Get Back to Nature (2000AD Sci-Fi Special 1985)- DR & Quinch's Incredibly Excruciating Agony Page (Prog #525-534)
author: Alan             Moore
